Description.Text: General Info:Set in the heart of Royal London, next-door to Hyde Park and Kensington Palace, this superb and uniquely styled apartment is a real gem. This completely newly refurbished property offers the benefits of space, comfort and independence in one of the world’s most vibrant cities.Location:We are between Paddington and Hyde Park. Bayswater is close to the West end.Area:London’s most beloved open spaces: Kensington Gardens, Hyde Park, and Holland Park are all within a few minutes walk and provide the perfect opportunity to escape from the city’s bustling streets. Recreation:Queensway provides an eclectic selection of restaurants, chic bars, trendy shops, and the well-known Whiteley’s Shopping Centre.Rooms:All standard amenities include CD/DVD player, dishwasher, fully fitted kitchens, iron/ironing boards, microwave, shower, TV and washing machine.Policies:**Notice to guests: When you arrive you will need to call toll free 0800 066 4697. The automatic message will connect you to someone who will give you a code to enter the hotel and all the information needed to get to your room.**

Set in the heart of Royal London, next-door to Hyde Park and Kensington Palacae this superb and uniquely styled apartment is a real gem. A completely new refurbished property offers the benefits of space, comfort and independence.
